title: The Favorites Sports Betting Podcast - NFL Draft Expert Scott Smith
itunes:title: The Favorites Sports Betting Podcast - NFL Draft Expert Scott Smith
description:
The NFL Draft goes live in Las Vegas on Thursday night, so to help project how the first round will play out we welcome on Scott Smith, an Action Network contributor and one of the most accurate NFL mock drafters in the last five years. Along with guest host Brendan Glasheen and pro gambler Simon Hunter, the trio previews the wild markets moves seen across the board thus far and gives out their favorite bets as the first round looms. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
